ygData.subject: Re: Slime 'bug' - expanded
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I found something like this when I was using the Change character type cheat, I found that if the slime has experience and it splits the new slime is
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 30
Message-ID: <17248.30.96.959279670@...>
Date: Wed, 14 Apr 1999 12:40:32 +1000
From: "Storey" <storey@...
Subject: Re: Slime 'bug' - expanded

Hi,
I found something like this when I was using the "Change character
type" cheat, I found that if the slime has experience and it splits
the new slime is added to your army (You keep it when the level
finishes), and the new slime has 1/2 the experience (And the original
loses half).
Only slimes that split with experience and are added to your mainstay
army (The one you keep at the end of the level) will give you shields
when they die, the others just vanish - no shields to collect.
The split slimes also keep all the attributes of the original slimes.
I never really bothered using this bug (Or feature), I found it easier
to modify the hex values (Lots of trial and error) similar to the way
that boost program is supposed to, and found some really strange
things happen with large values.

Cya,
David Storey


From: "Seth Mitchell" <smitchell@...>

There is a way to slowly make a lot of money.  I have made over
40,000,000 dollars in one level.  Here's how to do it :

When your main character is pretty well-off

1.  Hire a Slime.
2.  Train the Slime so it has a lot of stuff (Intelligence and Armor
    are best)
3.  Go to an empty level.
4.  Let the Slime reproduce
5.  Kill the reproductions
6.  If a shield is left, take it, if not, try again.

Sometimes the Slimes will resurrect over their shields, and you get
the money.  I'm not sure how it works, but sometimes when you
exit the level, you dont keep any slimes.  I'm not sure, but I think
if
you DON'T kill the starting slime, then you'll keep every slime you
have at the end of the level.  Then you can upgrade those, kill their
offspring, and make a lot of money.


--
SgMitchell
smitchell@...
